ndr_attributes.ndr_attributes.load_text(input_file)[source]

Load text from a text file and return as a string.

Parameters:

input_file (str) – Path to the file to be read.

Returns:

Content of the file as a string.

Return type:

str

ndr_attributes.ndr_attributes.clean_text(text)[source]

Lowercase and remove punctuation from a string.

Parameters:

text (str) – Input string that needs to be cleaned.

Returns:

Cleaned string with all lowercase characters and without any punctuation.

Return type:

str

ndr_attributes.ndr_attributes.count_words(input_file)[source]

Count unique words in a string.

Parameters:

input_file (str) – Path to the file whose unique words need to be counted.

Returns:

A Counter object containing the frequency of each unique word in the input file.

Return type:

Counter
